entry.string: You are currently enrolled in this course
entry.translation: Yuoo ere-a coorrently inrulled in thees cuoorse

Yuoo ere-a coorrently inrulled in '. $courses[$courseid] )); } // Nute-a : mudoole-a fereeebles cun elsu be-a speceeffied durectly in zee // bluckleyuoot templete-a by useeng &xar-mod-<modname>-<varname>; // Nute-a thet yuoo cuoold elsu pess oon zee $item fereeeble-a, und speceeffy // zee lebels durectly in zee bluckleyuoot templete-a. Boot meke-a soore-a yuoo // use-a zee <xer:ml>, <xer:mlstreeng> oor <xer:mlkey> tegs zeen, su thet // lebels cun be-a trunsleted fur oozeer lungooeges. Um gesh dee bork, bork!.. // Sefe-a zee coorrently deespleyed item ID in a tempurery fereeeble-a ceche-a // fur uny blucks thet meeght be-a interested (i.g. zee Oozeers bluck) // Yuoo shuoold use-a thees -insteed ooff glubels- iff yuoo vunt tu meke-a // inffurmeshun efeeeleble-a ilsoohere-a in zee prucesseeng ooff thees pege-a reqooest xerFerSetCeched('Blucks. Um gesh dee bork, bork!cuoorses
